articles.author: Frank Corva
articles.description:
“Someone needs to be the keeper and reiterator of the vision. There's a ton of work to do. When you have to walk a thousand miles and have only taken the first step, it feels like a long way. It really helps if there is someone saying, ‘We are one step closer, and the goal is not a mirage.’” -Steve Jobs
Stacy Herbert, Director of the National Bitcoin Office (ONBTC) of the Office of the President of El Salvador, shared the above quote with me, while beaming with both pride and resolve, at the onset of my interview with her.
It’s clear that Herbert is on a mission, a mission that started in 2010 when she and her partner, Max Keiser, first discovered Bitcoin and became some of the earliest spokespeople for it soon after. This mission now includes the President of El Salvador, Nayib Bukele, as…
articles.title: El Salvador’s Bitcoin Office Celebrates 21 Months of Success, Sets Stage for Renaissance 2.0

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market continues to surprise investors, with Uniswap (UNI) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) taking center stage as they post impressive gains. While Uniswap remains a dominant force in the decentralized exchange (DEX) space, Mpeppe’s rapid rise is attracting both retail and institutional investors. As these two tokens capture attention, let’s dive into their performance and why they are shaking up the market.
 
Uniswap Leads DEX Market, but Faces Challenges in Trading Volume 
Uniswap (UNI) continues to reign as the largest decentralized exchange token by market cap, controlling between 60-85% of the DEX market. This dominance is a testament to the platform’s long-standing influence in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. However, despite its leading position, Uniswap (UNI) has been…
articles.title: Top Gains Alert: Uniswap and Mpeppe Performance Has Taken The Market By Storm

Let’s explore how Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe are navigating the current landscape and why they’re positioned for a significant surge.
 
Quant (QNT) Shows Signs of Strength Amid Increased Trader Activity 
Quant (QNT) has seen a surge in trader activity, with the token ranked as the 70th largest cryptocurrency in the global market. Despite its recent underperformance compared to other top crypto assets over the past year, Quant (QNT) has displayed solid buying momentum, pushing its price to higher levels.
 
At the time of writing, Quant (QNT)’s price was at $70.75, marking a sign…
articles.title: Experts Predicted 150% Rally For Quant and Mpeppe Once Market Turns Around

articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is always buzzing with excitement, but recent developments around Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are taking investor interest to new heights. Quant has been making headlines for its recent bullish performance, but for those looking to maximize returns, Mpeppe might just be the hidden gem you need. Let’s dive into the latest updates and explore why Mpeppe could be the better choice for future gains.
 
Quant –  Is There More Room to Grow? 
Quant (QNT) has captured attention in the crypto world with its impressive recovery in recent weeks. After breaking free from a falling wedge pattern, a key bullish indicator, QNT has surged by over 17% in the last week, reaching a price of $71.04. This marks the highest point for the token since late August 2024. Notably, despite…
articles.title: Is It Too Late To Purchase QNT as Price Soars? Mpeppe Is Your Best Option

In a rapidly evolving decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape, Uniswap (UNI) has maintained its position as a leading decentralized exchange (DEX), showcasing impressive weekly trading volumes. Meanwhile, a new contender, Mpeppe (MPEPE), has captured the attention of major investors, including Uniswap whales, with predictions of a staggering 150% price surge in September. As Uniswap remains at the forefront of the DEX market, these whales are diversifying into promising tokens like Mpeppe (MPEPE), fueling speculation about massive gains ahead.
 
Uniswap: Dominating the DEX Market 
Uniswap (UNI) has consistently demonstrated its dominance in the DEX market, recently topping the leaderboard with an impressive $9.09 billion in weekly trading volume. According to data from on-chain analytics, t…

articles.description:
As the world of online gaming and gambling rapidly evolves, cryptocurrencies are leading the charge toward more secure, decentralized, and rewarding experiences. Two standout tokens in this space are BinaryX (BNX) and Mpeppe (MPEPE), both offering revolutionary solutions that enhance gaming and gambling activities. In this article, we’ll explore how these cryptocurrencies are pushing boundaries and why they are must-haves for enthusiasts looking to elevate their gaming experience.
 
Decentralized Systems for Enhanced Security 
One of the primary benefits of both BinaryX (BNX) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) is their reliance on decentralized systems. In traditional gambling platforms, users face various risks such as data breaches and fraud. However, Mpeppe (MPEPE) and BinaryX (BNX) leverage decentrali…
articles.title: Take Your Gaming and Gambling To The Next Level With BinaryX and Casino Coin Mpeppe (MPEPE)

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: Web3 security firm Cyvers detected suspicious transactions on Indonesian exchange Indodax’s wallets on September 11th. The attack involved over 150 transactions and digital assets worth an estimated $20.58 million are believed to have been stolen. Some experts suspect the North Korean hacking group Lazarus Group may be responsible due to attack characteristics. Indodax Hack Shows […]
articles.title: Indonesian Crypto Exchange Hit by $20.5M Hack, Lazarus Group Suspected

articles.author: Marcin Kazmierczak
articles.description: As staking grows in popularity through liquid staking derivatives, there is a need to better quantify staking returns for different platforms and how they change over time, says Marcin Kazmierczak, co-founder and coo, RedStone.
articles.title: Are Ethereum Staking Yields Too High?

articles.author: Fadi Aboualfa
articles.description: In the world of crypto, digital assets, and the dream of decentralization, the middleman is a figure of scorn. We speak of peer-to-peer networks with no need for gatekeepers. Yet, whether we like it or not, intermediaries haunt every corner of this landscape, says Fadi Aboualfa, head of research, Copper.co.
articles.title: The Middleman’s Shadow in the Tokenization Complex

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Solana (SOL) has recently achieved a significant milestone by recording the highest number of daily active addresses in its history. This has come at a time when the cryptocurrency has equally been recording high volatility, resulting in speculations on what may drive it and perhaps influence the market with it.
 
 
Solana Makes New Record
 
On September 10, 2024, Solana surpassed 5 million daily active addresses, up from 1.05 million earlier in the year. This shows that the Solana ecosystem is increasing, especially DeFi and NFTs, which are gaining steam.
 

 
 
An increase in active addresses usually denotes more users interacting with the network which, in turn, could be a positive indication toward the platform’s longer-term viability and adoption.
 
The surge in the number of daily ac…
articles.title: Solana Shatters Blockchain Record With Most Active Users—How Did It Happen?

articles.author: Krisztian  Sandor
articles.description: It's been a trend for the last few weeks that cryptocurrencies selloff as the U.S. traditional markets open, underscoring a general risk-off sentiment among American investors.
articles.title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $56K as Stocks Sell Off in Weak U.S. Trading

articles.author: Oliver Knight
articles.description: Bitcoin {{BTC}} is in the midst of a period of negative correlation with gold, signalling a risk-averse environment where investors favor traditional safe-haven assets like gold as opposed to speculative assets.
articles.title: Bitcoin Decouples From Gold as Crypto Continues in Bearish Phase

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the world of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency continues to expand, all eyes are on Nvidia’s Q3 earnings report and how it could impact two key players in the AI crypto space: Artificial Superintelligence Alliance (FET) and GoodEgg (GEGG). Both tokens have seen impressive gains and attention in recent months, but the upcoming earnings could be a turning point for their future trajectories.
 
GoodEgg (GEGG): The AI Social Scoring System Shaking Up the Market 
While Artificial Superintelligence Alliance (FET) has been making headlines, GoodEgg (GEGG) is quietly positioning itself as a unique contender in the AI-driven cryptocurrency world. What sets GoodEgg apart from other tokens is its groundbreaking approach to blending AI with social interaction through its innovative social …
articles.title: Top AI Driven Crypto Coins 2024: GoodEgg Becomes Leading AI Coin Over FET After Announcing  New ‘Social Scoring System’

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In a surprising twist for the crypto world, a British tech entrepreneur has come forward to highlight the revolutionary potential of GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-powered crypto dating platform. While many projects in the blockchain space focus on finance and gaming, GoodEgg is taking a unique approach by integrating social interactions with decentralized finance (DeFi). As a result, Binance Coin (BNB) whales have begun to take notice, making significant purchases in the presale phase of this innovative project.
 
GoodEgg (GEGG): A Pioneer in the Social-Fi and Dating Space 
GoodEgg’s concept is simple yet groundbreaking. Combining dating with cryptocurrency rewards, the platform uses AI-driven social scoring to match users based on compatibility and activity within the platform. As users engage in…
articles.title: British Tech Entrepreneur Uncovers Why GoodEgg’s Crypto Dating Platform Will Shake Up The Market, Binance Whales Buy Big

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the rapidly evolving world of cryptocurrencies, new opportunities and challenges arise daily. While some projects struggle to maintain momentum, others seize the moment and push forward with innovative technologies. One of the latest standout projects is GoodEgg (GEGG), a bullish AI-driven cryptocurrency that is making waves in the digital asset space. Meanwhile, Internet Computer (ICP), once a promising player in the decentralized internet space, has been hit hard, partly due to the downturn in tech giant Nvidia’s performance, which has had a ripple effect on AI-related sectors.
 
GoodEgg (GEGG): A Rising Star in the AI Crypto Space 
GoodEgg (GEGG) is not just another meme coin; it represents a fusion of social impact, innovation, and AI-driven technology. Its “Play 2 Date” concept has…
articles.title: GoodEgg (GEGG) Becomes New Bullish AI Crypto While Internet Computer (ICP) Suffers On Back Off Nvidia Downturn

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrency investments, a notable shift is occurring. A prominent Binance Coin (BNB) millionaire has recently liquidated 10% of their BNB holdings to invest in an emerging Social Scoring A.I. meme coin, GoodEgg (GEGG). This move has caught the attention of the crypto community, especially as analysts predict an astonishing 18,000% uplift for GoodEgg. Here’s a detailed look at why this decision is making waves and what it means for Binance Coin (BNB).
 
Binance Coin (BNB) Market Dynamics 
Binance Coin (BNB) has been a key player in the cryptocurrency market, with its price recently touching a high of $600 on August 23. However, since then, BNB has faced increased selling pressure, pushing its price below a crucial trendline. This recent development indi…
articles.title: Crypto BNB Millionaire Liquidates 10% of Holdings For New Social Scoring A.I Meme Coin, Analyst Anticipate 18,000% Uplift

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the rapidly evolving world of cryptocurrency, three standout projects—Internet Computer (ICP), Decide A.I (DCD), and GoodEgg (GEGG)—are making waves as they set to dominate the AI-driven blockchain space. With advancements in decentralized applications, artificial intelligence, and unique meme-driven features, these projects are creating a diverse and robust ecosystem for crypto enthusiasts.
 
Internet Computer (ICP): Revolutionizing Web3 
Internet Computer (ICP) is pioneering the next phase of Web3 development, aiming to decentralize the internet and provide a scalable, efficient, and secure environment for decentralized applications (dApps). Developed by the DFINITY Foundation, ICP seeks to replace traditional cloud services and create a decentralized global computer network. This inn…
articles.title: Internet Computer (ICP), Decide A.I (DCD) & GoodEgg (GEGG) Set to Dominate AI Crypto Sphere

articles.author: Ryan Gorman
articles.description: Trump and Harris didn’t mention crypto once last night because, despite the industry’s pretensions to relevance, most people don’t care about these issues, says Ryan Gorman.
articles.title: The Debate Showed How Little Crypto Matters to Voters and Politicians

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: The latest consumer price index (CPI) from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics shows that inflation cooled to 2.5% in August, marking the slowest rate since 2021. Meanwhile, core CPI, which strips out the fluctuating food and energy sectors, posted a 0.3% increase for the month. Stocks, Bitcoin, and Gold Unmoved by CPI Data On […]
articles.title: Calm Markets: Stocks, Crypto, and Gold Show Little Movement Post CPI

articles.description: Internet Computer gained 2.7% and Uniswap rose 0.3%, as all 18 other assets declined.
articles.title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update:  Index Falls 2.1% with Only Two Gainers
